articles.author: DAVID RISING, JINTAMAS SAKSORNCHAI
articles.title: American and Australian tourists die, raising toll to 4 in Laos alcohol poisoning incident - The Associated Press
articles.description: Officials say an Australian teenager has died after drinking tainted alcohol in Laos, and the U.S. State Department has confirmed an American also died in the same party town, bringing the death toll to four. Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese told Pa…
articles.content: VIENTIANE, Laos (AP) An Australian teenager has died after drinking tainted alcohol in Vang Vieng, Laos, in what Australias prime minister on Thursday called every parents nightmare, and the U.S. Sta… [+4021 chars]
